1085940.name: Orders Of The Ruler
1085940.description:
Join the medieval battlefield with Orders of the Ruler, an RTS game that offers a rich and detailed environment. Explore 9 different maps, command 3 unique factions, and use over 20 different units and 10 unique buildings to build your base and defeat your opponents. Utilize the game's unique orders system to gain an upper hand in battle and defend your realm with the ultimate ruler character. Play against AI in a campaign or multiplayer mode and prove yourself as the ultimate ruler.

Features; For now, OOTR has 2 Factions ,3 Maps, 15+ Characters ,12+ Buildings and 3 Game mode. (It will be upgraded very soon!)

Some Of the Characters and Buildings;

  • Meet the hardworking and loyal Workers of Orders of the Ruler, who tirelessly cut trees, plow fields, mine ores, and construct buildings at the command of their RULER. These peasants will not only work to build and maintain your base, but will also fight to protect their lands if necessary.

  • With our factions there will be faction based buildings and characters that you can control. Every character and building will be unique with their faction.

  • The Spearman, armed with their long pointy tools, are the backbone of the war. Invented for fruit gathering and hunting, these weapons have proven to be effective in battle. With the most range of all melee weapons, they are a formidable force on the battlefield.

  • The Knight, with their superior armor and big swords, are the elite soldiers of the game. They are noble and expensive but are unmatched on the battlefield. No simple soldier can stand against a heavily armored Knight.

  • The Militia, made up of trained peasant fighters, are not as powerful as the other units but they are willing to fight to protect their village and ensure freedom.

  • The Base, your main hub, is where you rule, command your ORDERS and defend your lands. A good ruler never escapes and must protect their base even if their life is on the line.

  • The Farm, a crucial building that produces food to feed yourself and your people. Food is essential to maintaining strength and without it, there can be no soldiers, no peasants, and no RULER. Keep your farms safe, as the old saying goes, 'without food, there is no army'.

Gameplay;


Become the ultimate medieval ruler with Orders of the Ruler, an indie RTS game that immerses you in a world of strategy and warfare. As the ruler, you will command your people and lead them to victory.




  • Build and upgrade your buildings

  • Summon soldiers to your cause

  • Gather resources to improve your lands and army

  • Defend your territory and expand your kingdom by defeating other players

With 9 maps to conquer, 3 factions to command, and over 20 different units to deploy, every battle is unique and challenging. Join the battlefield and claim your throne as the ultimate ruler.
Experience the thrill of medieval warfare like never before with the multiplayer gameplay of Orders of the Ruler. With a balanced and unique game that combines old-school RTS elements with new and exciting features, every battle is a new adventure. Master the game's unique "orders" system, and defend your realm with the ultimate ruler character. Play against AI or other players in a campaign or multiplayer mode and prove yourself as the ultimate ruler.
Download Orders of the Ruler Now and start your journey to become the ultimate ruler!

Perks;


Introducing the Perk system in Orders of the Ruler. Players now have the ability to choose 2 perks before the start of any game mode, from a selection of 6 available perks. These perks will give them passive effects throughout the match, adding an extra layer of strategy and customization to the gameplay. With a range of perks to choose from, players can tailor their gameplay to their own unique style and gain an edge in battle.
Whether you're looking to boost resource gathering speed, increase the strength of your units, or gain other special abilities, the Perk system in Orders of the Ruler offers a variety of possibilities for players to enhance their gameplay experience. So, choose your Perks wisely and dominate the battlefield!

Orders;

Introducing the powerful "Orders" system in Orders of the Ruler. This unique feature allows players to gain an upper hand in battle by giving them the ability to call upon special abilities and enhance their gameplay experience.
In order to use Orders, players must first gather faith by placing Monks around their base. Faith is the only resource required to use Orders, and it can be gathered gradually over time. Orders will become available to players as they upgrade their base, unlocking new and more powerful abilities.
The Orders system offers a wide range of abilities, from calling in powerful airstrikes to summoning reinforcements to the battlefield. Each Order has its own cool-down period, allowing players to strategically plan when to use them for maximum effect.
So whether you're looking to turn the tide of battle or gain a strategic advantage, the Orders system in Orders of the Ruler offers endless possibilities for players to enhance their gameplay experience. Download the game now and experience the power of Orders!

Factions;

First, there is the Redcross faction, known for its powerful infantry and advanced technology. This faction excels in defensive strategies and is a formidable force on the battlefield.
Next, there is the Golden Eagle faction, a highly mobile and agile force. This faction is skilled in hit-and-run tactics and excels in fast-paced, aggressive playstyles.
Lastly, there is the Linden Shield faction, known for its sturdy defenses and strong ranged units. This faction is well-suited for players who prefer a more calculated and methodical approach to battle.
Each faction has its own unique strengths and weaknesses, allowing players to choose the one that best suits their preferred playstyle. Whether you prefer a defensive, aggressive, or calculated approach to battle, there's a faction for you in Orders of the Ruler.

Domination;



Introducing the Domination game mode of Orders of the Ruler. In this unique 8-player mode, players take control of their ruler character and have limited control over their army. With each phase of the game, players can purchase new units, merge existing ones of the same class to make them stronger, and use powerful "orders" to gain an upper hand in battle.
Strategize and control key resource-gathering points scattered throughout the map to dominate the competition. Each resource point is located in a designated lane and players must fight to control and expand their territory.
In the center of the map lies the ultimate goal, a key point that players must hold onto for as long as possible to claim victory and dominate the game. With 8 players battling for control, the competition is fierce and the stakes are high. By merging units of the same class and utilizing the powerful "orders" system, players will be able to create a formidable army and outsmart their opponents. Will you rise to the top and emerge victorious in this intense game mode?
Join the battlefield and test your strategic skills in the Domination game mode of Orders of the Ruler. With limited control over your army, you'll need to outsmart your opponents and make every move count in your quest for dominance. Download the game now and see if you have what it takes to be the ultimate ruler.
1085940.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 荷兰语, 日语, 韩语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语, 简体中文, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 印地语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
